mapper.sql: a.id, a.section, a.provider_id, a.province_code, a.city_code, a.update_date, a.update_user, a.create_date, a.create_user, a.provider_type, a.carrier_type, b.name as provider_name
mapper.select:
select
from mp_phone_section a,mp_provider b where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.provider_id = b.id
mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') as id from dual
insert into mp_phone_section
id,
section,
provider_id,
province_code,
city_code,
update_date,
update_user,
create_date,
create_user,
provider_type,
carrier_type,

mapper.update:
update mp_phone_section
section = #{section,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
provider_id = #{providerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carrier_type = #{carrierType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
provider_type = #{providerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carrier_type = #{carrierType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.province_code provinceCode,a.city_code cityCode,b.`name` providerName from mp_phone_section a left join mp_provider b on a.provider_id = b.id where a.del_flag=1 and a.section = #{section,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
